<<<<<<< HEAD
An essay upon the inscription of Macduff's crosse in Fyfe by I.C., 1678. Cunningham, James, d. 1697?
20 p.
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ..., Edinburgh : 1678.
The ascription to James Carmichael cited in Lowndes II, 569, probably arises from confusion of names, written by James Cunningham. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
